comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Let’s start by fixing your post format:Code: [url=https://ibb.co/9q7Bh3m][img width=1300]https://i.ibb.co/mH3d0Fr/Destiny-X-1-Page.png[/img][/url]But even if you fix it, it still won’t show because newbies account are not allowed to post images here in the forum and if you want to skip the process of having to wait until you rank up to jr member then just go on and purchase copper[1] membership it will enable you post images and then you’ll be able to have your Ann thread properly. [1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promote

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Destinyx, it's a weird domain to hear, but I check your site you have a good UI/UX.What I like your casino do give a warning when someone is using an IP address from a restricted countries, but as long as the person reside in a country where it's not restricted in your site, it's fine to use VPN/change DNS, of course I wouldn't surprise you will be asked to submit KYC.My suggestion is you need to upgrade your SSL because you're still use "http" without s.

comments.author: spyrosc200
comments.body: ''DestinyX is restricted in your area. If you reside outside the current area and have a valid ID, you may proceed.''My country is not in your prohibited jurisdictions. What is the purpose of the warning?

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Welcome to the forum, the ANN looks great and professional. The color scheme is great and soothes the eyes. The branding of the site also attracts the customer to be honest. The main advantage here we will have that you guys are providing both casino games and sports events. So people will have both choices here. My only concern is that, are people from all over the world allowed to play on the site? And what about the KYC restrictions here?

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk. Do you have any promotions planned for our community? You might try to host a couple giveaways or free spin contests to try to bring some players to the site. I can help with promotional services if/when you are ready as well. Feel free to send me a pm.

comments.author: edmundduke
comments.body: Are you the owner of the site ? When i click the link it shows /ref/equalizer1 The site overall looks clean and with quite a bit of history but i dont see much action there, im guessing that is what you are here to change. I saw links to certifications/licenses aswell so tahts good.Also are you really affiliated with Razer ? I see their logo on your site.

comments.author: Reatim
comments.body: At first look I thought its a Band name or some other project and not a gambling site because of the domain name , But checking the site makes me realize that the UI looks good and presentable .Welcome to the forum DestinyX.com and its good that you followed the advise of purchasing copper membership .another thing is like asked above , any plans of giving freebies or bonuses exclusively for Bitcointalk users? we will be happy having that to try your site .

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: First and foremost, i did like to say a warm welcome to the forum, and i also did like to join others in commending your choice of design on the site, it looks really professional and shows that something of value was indeed invested in building the site.Just few things i will like to point out here, and first is that, you guys should consider launching a signature ad campaign, this will help announce the presence of this casino to all users of this forum,  and also to everyone visiting the forum from various places and different search engines, promotion on this forum this forum is one of the most productive and cheapest, most especially for crypto related businesses.Secondly, i did like to ask if the casino has its own native token? like i saw in the header of the site where it is written Earn 6000 $BXC plus $10,000 bonus.  is the BXC the native token for the casino, if yes, please, where can we find it and possibly buy some if it's good for investment?

comments.author: iv4n

If you reside outside the current area and have a valid ID, you may proceed.''My country is not in your prohibited jurisdictions. What is the purpose of the warning?Same here, my country is also on the list... but there is another part as well:Looks like we are free to use VPN, they even gave us some suggestions... and the first time I saw "change your DNS"! I guess they are ready to get that extra step to attract players from restricted areas. I am not sure if that is a good or bad thing...

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Quote from: iv4n on November 01, 2023, 08:24:33 AM-snip-Same for my country.I think better (DNS) rather than VPN. Because people could be from restricted country from their term & condition, once we got problem some casino use these tactic. My country is not on the list.There is no reason for me using VPN, just DNS should be enough.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk platform. I see you already done the needful here. This shows that you would make a good representative of your casino. I like the fact that you are active your first day of registration unlike others that just register and get lost without any response to questions from potential clients on their first day. First impression matters here and you have set the pace for your casino. Nevertheless, you have a good user interface and your website is well designed.  I believe you know promoting your casino would call more attention to it so therefore I. Will advise you to make budget for a promotional campaign and seek the expertise of a campaign manager as there are lots of reputable managers here  you can contact Royse777 for your promotional campaign as he is good at servic delivery.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: Quote from: DestinyX on November 01, 2023, 04:48:34 AMAppreciate it - we strive to deliver the best UI/UX possible for DestinyX.com users. we're on HTTPS: https://destinyx.comI think you need to edit your first or original post and replace the image URL with the website HTTPS https://destinyx.com instead of inserting your referral link there because other users that click the image for the first might encounter an error like what happened on my end a while ago when I tried to visit it. The landing or home page of the website is the user's expectation for taking that action unless you are referring to a specific page.

comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: Seems like DestinyX.com has placed a global restriction. Like the other forum members, the system is giving me an error message when I'm trying to create an account. My country isn't in the restricted countries list on DestinyX. Perhaps, there is something wrong with your Geo-blocking system.However, I have found something different on DestinyX licensing. The company 'Titan Interactive N.V.' is registered (located) in Curacao, but the casino has taken the license from the Anjouan gaming license provider. This is the first time I have heard the name of Anjouan Gaming License.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: Mahdirakib on November 01, 2023, 03:24:47 PMSeems like DestinyX.com has placed a global restriction. Like the other forum members, the system is giving me an error message when I'm trying to create an account. My country isn't in the restricted countries list on DestinyX. Perhaps, there is something wrong with your Geo-blocking system.However, I have found something different on DestinyX licensing. The company 'Titan Interactive N.V.' is registered (located) in Curacao, but the casino has taken the license from the Anjouan gaming license provider. This is the first time I have heard the name of Anjouan Gaming License.It is likely a bug within their system which does not allow the whitelisted countries to access their services, there could be also a small possibly you are trying to access using a browser which offers VPN for free, like Opera or Brave. Check that out and let us know whether it helps at all. Also, good catch on their licensing issue, I wonder if there is some legitimate mistake behind it or this casino is trying to mess around with their licensing for some reason, obviously it is not a good signal for anyone minimally interested on depositing and trying this casino for the first time.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Quote from: Hispo on November 01, 2023, 04:32:51 PMQuote from: Mahdirakib on November 01, 2023, 03:24:47 PMSeems like DestinyX.com has placed a global restriction. Like the other forum members, the system is giving me an error message when I'm trying to create an account. My country isn't in the restricted countries list on DestinyX. Perhaps, there is something wrong with your Geo-blocking system.-snip-It is likely a bug within their system which does not allow the whitelisted countries to access their services, there could be also a small possibly you are trying to access using a browser which offers VPN for free, like Opera or Brave. Check that out and let us know whether it helps at all. -snip-I'm on a VPN and tried one of the countries that are not restricted by default, but I still got that message upon loading. They should create a whitelisting on these countries that are not included on the restricted list. This might confuse a lot of interested people and cause them to turn back because they think they cannot play in the platform.It's like they're trying to push people to use their recommended VPNs to remove the restrictions. I'm not quite sure about that but it gave me that impression tbh. The site looks nice, but it's only just that restriction that doesn't make sense.
